name: Pacifist Project
description:
Please comment how much score you got after finish playing the game. it never ends just the goal is to get as much score as possible.

Avoid the other black entities as they want to cause as much harm as possible.

Click on the Houses when nearby to protect them and gain score.

Use the purple cube, to save people (the black entities other than the player) to gain score and more when other entities are in the same cube.

The Black Entities can stop you by decreasing your health.
